request.description: Allow to get object array of information about artworks, including its item ID, title, artist, description, price, and the directory of the image source.

response.name: /item
response.body:
[
    {
        "itemID": 0,
        "name": "portrait of emperor rudolf ii",

request.description: Allow to get object array of information about orders, including its order ID, total price, and the purchases array, which contains purchase ID and item ID.
Allow an item, which includes its item ID, title, artist, description, price, and the directory of the image source, to be added into the item list.

request.description: Allow an order, which includes its order ID, total price, and the purchases array, which contains purchase ID and item ID, to be added into the orders list.
